text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , t , n , * * a , ans ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int * ) * n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { a [ j ] = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * ( j + 1 ) ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } for ( j = n - 2 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { a [ j ] [ k ] += MAX ( a [ j + 1 ] [ k ] , a [ j + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , * * a ) ; free ( a ) ; } return 0 ; }
